summary: Adds ladders to the Riften well and changes the Thieves Guild Fast-Travel player placement.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
I grew tired of having to re-open the Thieves Guild coffin entrance every time I wanted to go inside, so I changed the Fast-Travel player placement to be down the stairs in front of the trapdoor. I figured why not go a step further so I also placed two ladders in the Riften Well; one for 'The Ragged Flagon' and another for 'The Ragged Flagon - Cistern.' The ladders appear when you return to Riften anytime after clearing out Aringoth's safe from the 'Loud and Clear' Thieves Guild quest.

Creation Kit Details:
The only vanilla object modified is the Fast-Travel player placement Marker for the Thieves Guild coffin entrance.

Installation:
Put into the Data folder or install with NMM.
author: BradTheAmerican
